sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì wǒ de hǎo péngyou.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is my good friend.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 今天很冷，你要多穿衣服。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīntiān hěn lěng, nǐ yào duō chuān yīfu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il fait très froid aujourd'hui, tu dois t'habiller plus chaudement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It's very cold today, you should wear more clothes.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng jìn, huānyíng lái wǒ jiā.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Entrez s'il vous plaît, bienvenue chez moi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please come in, welcome to my home.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ yǒu liǎng gè jiějie.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I have two older sisters.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Māma zuò de cài hěn hǎochī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les plats que maman prépare sont très bons.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The dishes mom makes are delicious.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 你可以试一试这件衣服。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ kěyǐ shì yī shì zhè jiàn yīfu.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You can try on this piece of clothing.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ měitiān yǒu sì jié kè.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I have four classes every day.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuan kàn diànyǐng.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I like to watch movies.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ jiā yǒu yī zhī gǒu, jiào Xiǎobái.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous avons un chien à la maison, il s'appelle Xiaobai.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We have a dog at home, named Xiaobai.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ jīntiān méi chī wǔfàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I didn't eat lunch today.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ zhù zài wǔ lóu.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I live on the fifth floor.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ míngtiān gěi nǐ dǎ diànhuà.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I will call you tomorrow.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zhèngzài xiě zuòyè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est en train de faire ses devoirs.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is doing homework.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Duìbuqǐ, wǒ lái wǎn le.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Sorry, I'm late.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ shuō de duì.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You are right.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们下午一起去打球吧。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen xiàwǔ yīqǐ qù dǎqiú ba.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Allons jouer au ballon ensemble cet après-midi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let's go play ball together this afternoon.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bāng wǒ ná yīxià nà běn shū.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: S'il te plaît, aide-moi à prendre ce livre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please help me get that book.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng qù wàiguó lǚyóu.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I want to travel abroad.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ zhèngzài xuéxí hànyǔ.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I am learning Chinese.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ yào yī bēi kāfēi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I would like a cup of coffee.
